评论详情: I recently got a floral print shirt in a medium, and it was an exact fit! The vibrant colors and beautiful patterns really stand out, making it perfect for both casual outings and dressier occasions. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, ensuring comfort all day long while providing a flattering fit.

The floral print is vibrant and adds a fun pop to any outfit. I love how versatile this top is; I can dress it up with a skirt for a night out or keep it casual with high-waisted jeans. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, making it ideal for warm weather.

Really nice summer cami.  Comfy and cool.

评论概述: Soft fabric, fits true to size
评论详情: Our measurements for reference are: 135 lbs, 5'3", shoulders 17, bust 38, underbust 32.5, natl waist 34, hips 38, belly 35, torso length 19, inseam 28. We basically took a guess and ordered a size Large.  This top fits as expected. It definitely fits well in the bust, and it is also definitely a slim fit, showing off a few imperfections down lower in our belly, but that is to be expected. The fabric is really, really soft and silky feeling, which is a plus in our book. It is not transparent. Love the big orange flower!

Spaghetti strap tank top with adjustable straps. The flower print is very vibrant and has good color to it. It's very soft and comfortable.  Has a slight sheerness and stretch to it. Fits well and doesn't itch. This is a great summer shirt to pair with some cute shorts and looks great with jean jackets.
This is perfect for me in this hot, summer heat. I only wear tank top. This fits perfectly, is super cute with the design and color, and is very light weight. I would get this again.

This is a very cute and nice quality top.  It has a super cute low square corset-like neckline with a pretty large tropical flower that is very flattering and I like the straps are adjustable for a perfect fit.  It is a very smooth and soft fabric that is stretchy and breathable.  It washes well with no shrinking, warping or loss of softness.  I love it.

I absolutely adore Y2K for restocking my summer staples. The fit is true to size, they have absolutely nailed the late 90s/early 00s aesthetic, and the price is definitely right. You cannot beat them for summer fun. So far they have held up in the wash well which makes this ridiculously affordable on top of looking lovely! Recommended!
